titles: The arts of grandeur and submission, or, A discourse concerning the behaviour of great men towards their inferiours, and of inferiour personages towards men of greater quality written in Latin by Joannes Casa ... ; and rendered into English by Henry Stubbe ...

date: First printed in English, May Day, 1665.
